headline: Smoked Fish Dip
name: Smoked Fish Dip
description: This smoky fish dip is made in minutes by blending smoked whitefish, mayo, sour cream, seafood seasoning, hot pepper sauce, and Worcestershire sauce.
recipeIngredient: 4 drops hot pepper sauce, or to taste
3 drops Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
1 pinch seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay

recipeInstructions.text: Place whitefish, sour cream, and mayonnaise in the bowl of a food processor; season with hot pepper sauce, Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, seafood seasoning, and cracked black pepper.
Blend until combined with a spread-like consistency.
